subject: Olympic Games (2012)
European Sovereign Debt Crisis (2010- )
Budgets and Budgeting
Politics and Government
Unemployment
lead_paragraph: Griping about the cost of the Olympics is so common in host countries it could qualify as sport. But it is clear that the Games come with a financial burden.
snippet: Griping about the cost of the Olympics is so common in host countries it could qualify as sport. But it is clear that the Games come with a financial burden.
